name: MegaVolt - Beta 1.0
description:
Blast your way to the top of the tower as fast as you can!

Build up energy and release it in powerful shockwaves to clear paths, demolish enemies, and restore power to the city!

Scale the tower alone, or work with a friend! Just be careful not to fry each other!

[Controls for Keyboard:]
Player 1 -
-WASD to move
-Right Ctrl to charge
-Right Shift to switch modes
-1 to start
-5 to "insert coin"

Player 2 -
-Arrow keys to move
-Numpad 1 to charge
-Numpad 2 to switch modes
-2 to start
-6 to "insert coin"

X-Input support (both players):
-DPad or Left Stick to move
-A to charge
-B to switch modes
-Start to start
-Select to "insert coin"
